### Call necessary packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytuesdayR)
library(usethis)
library(here)
library(lubridate)
```

### Load in data

```{r}
b_lyrics <- readRDS(here("data", "b_lyrics.RDS"))
ts_lyrics <- readRDS(here("data", "ts_lyrics.RDS"))
sales <- readRDS(here("data", "sales.RDS"))
```

## Part 1A  

## 1.  

```{r}
sales %>% 
  mutate(released = mdy(str_remove(released, "\\(([A-Z]){2}\\)\\[([0-9]){2}\\]"))) %>% 
  mutate(sales = sales/1000000) %>% 
  filter(country %in% c("US", "UK", "World","WW"))


table(sales$country)
```
